languages.text: {n}Гемункул замечает Маражая.{/n} "Дракон Эзирраеш. После того, как ты пошел против архонта Опустошительной бури, ты решил нарушить еще и желание архонта Черного сердца? Тебя вышвырнули на арену, чтобы ты издох. Убогая некомпетентность в подчинении хозяевам".

{n}The Haemonculus notices Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. After you went against the Archon of the Reaving Tempest, you decided to violate the wishes of the Archon of the Black Heart as well? You were thrown into the arena to die. You show wretched incompetence by defying your masters."
languages.original_text: {n}Гемункул замечает Маражая.{/n} "Дракон Эзирраеш. После того, как ты пошел против архонта Опустошительной бури, ты решил нарушить еще и желание архонта Черного сердца? Тебя вышвырнули на арену, чтобы ты издох. Убогая некомпетентность в подчинении хозяевам".

traits.locale_text: {n}The haemonculus notices Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. After you went against the Archon of the Reaving Tempest, you decided to violate the wishes of the Archon of the Black Heart as well? You were thrown into the arena to die. You show wretched incompetence by defying your masters."

{n}The Haemonculus notices Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. After you went against the Archon of the Reaving Tempest, you decided to violate the wishes of the Archon of the Black Heart as well? You were thrown into the arena to die. You show wretched incompetence by defying your masters."

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスがマラズハイに気づく。{/n}「ドラコン・アエジレシュ。陰謀団〈略奪の嵐〉のアーコンに逆らった上、今度は黒き心臓のアーコンの願いも破ることにしたのか？お前は死ぬためにアリーナに投げ込まれたのだ。主人に逆らって、その惨めな無能さを晒すのか」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus notices Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. After you went against the Archon of the Reaving Tempest, you decided to violate the wishes of the Archon of the Black Heart as well? You were thrown into the arena to die. You show wretched incompetence by defying your masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスがマラズハイに気づく。{/n}「ドラコン・アエジレシュ。陰謀団〈略奪の嵐〉のアーコンに逆らった上、今度は黒き心臓のアーコンの願いも破ることにしたのか？お前は死ぬためにアリーナに投げ込まれたのだ。主人に逆らって、その惨めな無能さを晒すのか」

languages.text: {n}血伶人注意到了玛拉斋。{/n}“艾泽拉什裁决官，你忤逆了狂风阴谋团的执政官，现在又打算忤逆黑心阴谋团的执政官？你本该被丢进竞技场等死，可你却违抗了主人的命令，真是个无能之辈。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus notices Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. After you went against the Archon of the Reaving Tempest, you decided to violate the wishes of the Archon of the Black Heart as well? You were thrown into the arena to die. You show wretched incompetence by defying your masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人注意到了玛拉斋。{/n}“艾泽拉什裁决官，你忤逆了狂风阴谋团的执政官，现在又打算忤逆黑心阴谋团的执政官？你本该被丢进竞技场等死，可你却违抗了主人的命令，真是个无能之辈。”

languages.text: {n}El Hemónculo se fija en Marazhai.{/n} «Dracón Aezyrraesh. Primero desafías a la Arconte de la Tempestad Asoladora, ¿y ahora decides ir en contra de los deseos del Arconte del Corazón Negro? Te arrojaron a la arena para morir. Muestras una incompetencia suma al desafiar a tus amos».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus notices Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. After you went against the Archon of the Reaving Tempest, you decided to violate the wishes of the Archon of the Black Heart as well? You were thrown into the arena to die. You show wretched incompetence by defying your masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Hemónculo se fija en Marazhai.{/n} «Dracón Aezyrraesh. Primero desafías a la Arconte de la Tempestad Asoladora, ¿y ahora decides ir en contra de los deseos del Arconte del Corazón Negro? Te arrojaron a la arena para morir. Muestras una incompetencia suma al desafiar a tus amos».

languages.text: {n}Der Haemonculus bemerkt Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. Nachdem Ihr Euch gegen die Archontin des plündernden Sturms gestellt habt, habt Ihr nun entschieden, auch die Wünsche des Archonten des schwarzen Herzens zu ignorieren? Ihr wurdet in die Arena geworfen, um zu sterben. Ihr beweist elende Inkompetenz, indem Ihr Euren Meistern trotzt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus notices Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. After you went against the Archon of the Reaving Tempest, you decided to violate the wishes of the Archon of the Black Heart as well? You were thrown into the arena to die. You show wretched incompetence by defying your masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Haemonculus bemerkt Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. Nachdem Ihr Euch gegen die Archontin des plündernden Sturms gestellt habt, habt Ihr nun entschieden, auch die Wünsche des Archonten des schwarzen Herzens zu ignorieren? Ihr wurdet in die Arena geworfen, um zu sterben. Ihr beweist elende Inkompetenz, indem Ihr Euren Meistern trotzt."

languages.text: {n}L'hémoncule remarque la présence de Marazhai.{/n} « Dracon Aezyrraesh. Ainsi, après vous être opposé à l'archonte de la Tempête ravageuse, vous avez décidé d'aller également à l'encontre de la volonté de l'archonte du Cœur Noir ? Si vous avez été jeté dans l'arène, c'était pour y mourir. À continuellement défier vos maîtres, vous ne faites que démontrer votre incompétence. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus notices Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. After you went against the Archon of the Reaving Tempest, you decided to violate the wishes of the Archon of the Black Heart as well? You were thrown into the arena to die. You show wretched incompetence by defying your masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'hémoncule remarque la présence de Marazhai.{/n} « Dracon Aezyrraesh. Ainsi, après vous être opposé à l'archonte de la Tempête ravageuse, vous avez décidé d'aller également à l'encontre de la volonté de l'archonte du Cœur Noir ? Si vous avez été jeté dans l'arène, c'était pour y mourir. À continuellement défier vos maîtres, vous ne faites que démontrer votre incompétence. »

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus, Marazhai'ı fark ediyor.{/n} "Drakon Aezyrraesh. Müfteris Kasırga Arkonu'na karşı çıktıktan sonra şimdi de Kara Yürek Arkonu'nun iradesini reddetmeye mi karar verdin? Ölmek üzere arenaya atıldın. Efendilerine karşı çıkarak ne kadar ezik ve vasıfsız olduğunu gösteriyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus notices Marazhai.{/n} "Dracon Aezyrraesh. After you went against the Archon of the Reaving Tempest, you decided to violate the wishes of the Archon of the Black Heart as well? You were thrown into the arena to die. You show wretched incompetence by defying your masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkulus, Marazhai'ı fark ediyor.{/n} "Drakon Aezyrraesh. Müfteris Kasırga Arkon'una karşı çıktıktan sonra şimdi de Siyah Yürek Arkon'unun iradesini reddetmeye mi karar verdin? Ölmen için arenaya atıldın. Efendilerine karşı çıkarak ne kadar ezik ve vasıfsız olduğunu gösteriyorsun."
